metadata.how_to_trigger: Start Act 2 epilogue with Florrick being present and speak with the Flaming Fist.Debug Book -> Set quest flags -> Act 2 -> SCE - Epilogue -> Set up good path -> End debrief dialog -> Speak with S_SCE_StandingFlamingFist_001

0.speaker: Flaming Fist
0.text: We should march. Rest, maybe - then march.

1.speaker: Flaming Fist
1.text: Can't believe there are mind flayers targeting Baldur's Gate. We can't let them gain a foothold.
